content.question: A study reported that finger rings increase the growth of bacteria on health-care workers’ hands. Research suggests that 31 percent of health-care workers who wear rings have bacteria on one or both hands, and 27 percent of health-care workers without rings have bacteria on one or both hands. Suppose that independent random samples of 100 health-care workers wearing rings and 100 health-care workers not wearing rings are selected. What is the standard deviation of the sampling distribution of the difference in the sample proportions (wear rings minus does not wear rings) of health-care workers having bacteria on one or both hands?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction 0.31 times 0.69 over 100, end fraction, plus the fraction 0.27 times 0.73 over 100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.31</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.69</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.27</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.73</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of the fraction 0.31 times 0.69 over 100, end fraction, plus the fraction 0.27 times 0.73 over 100, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.31</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.69</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.27</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.73</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of the fraction 0.31 times 0.69 over 100, end root, plus the square root of the fraction 0.27 times 0.73 over 100, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.31</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.69</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.27</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.73</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 5.6: Sampling Distributions for Differences in Sample Proportions

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine parameters for probability distributions.
